# v2026.01.05

## New

- Activity indicator
- Borders
- Editor
- Entry
- Graphics view
- Picker
- Progress bar
- Shape view
- Scroll view
- Slider
- Switch
- Style

## Added

- New extensions based property mapping.
- New CSS cache for faster loading.

## Fixed

- Button
- New layout manager
- New view hander
- Image (using SKImage instead of Gtk.Picture - better, faster, more flexible)
